title: Paris Jackson looks rocker chic as she poses on the carpet with her boyfriend Gabriel Glenn
text:
It's date night for this hot Hollywood couple.

Paris Jackson, 21, and Gabriel Glenn, 20, stepped out for the amFAR Gala on Thursday evening rocking an edgy style and attitude as they posed for the cameras together on the purple carpet.

Rather than the typical carpet pose, this couple opted for learning on the shoulder of the other while Gabriel kept a stone cold pose.

Good cause: Paris Jackson and Gabriel Glenn stepped out for the amFAR Gala on Thursday evening rocking an edgy style and attitude as they posed for the cameras together on the purple carpet

Stunning: The model wore a blush-colored satin gown that had a jeweled accent on the left side of her chest

The model wore a blush-colored satin gown that had a jeweled accent on the left side of her chest.

She had her long hair dyed a lavender color at the tips which went well with the color of her dress for the evening.

For the evening, she posed with her hand on her hip and leaned into her longtime love Gabriel.

Details: She had her long hair dyed a lavender color at the tips which went well with the color of her dress for the evening

Accessories: She gripped tight to her small shoulder bag while wearing a number of rings and bracelets

Her beau didn't break his stern look while walking the carpet with his lady love.

He had his long brunette hair pulled to the side in a dramatic side part as he stared down the cameras.

For the occasion the star sported an all black suit that had a long tassel tie around the neck.

Friends: Paris and Gabriel smile at their table with Caroline D'Amore while inside the Gala

Gal pals: Paris and the guest of honor Gwyneth Paltrow smile together on the carpet before heading inside to the event

These two love birds have been together for a little over a year and celebrated the milestone back in April with a heartfelt post on Instagram.

'You're the light of my life. thank you for making me the happiest and luckiest girl in the world. Happy anniversary baby can't wait for another trip around the sun,' she wrote alongside the collection of photos of the two.

Paris is most definitely following in the footsteps of her late father Michael Jackson as she continues to tour and sing in the band with her lover called, The Soundflowers.

Earlier this month it was revealed that the band was close to signing their first record deal together.
description:
It's date night for this hot Hollywood couple.
Paris Jackson, 21, and Gabriel Glenn, 20, stepped out for the amFAR Gala on Thursday evening rocking an edgy style and attitude.
